Flexbox columns

Instead of using a .row you can use .row-flex and make use of the CSS Flex Box Layout Model for Pavilion’s columns. Flex-columns span the maximum width possible width. The normal column classes still apply within the ‘flexboxed’ row. To use a flex-column add a div with the class .col.

Please read the grid documentation first if you haven’t done so.

Flex elements

Add an element with the class .display-flex to create a flex element. You can now use flex utility classes to align and arrange the contained items according to the CSS Flex Box Layout Model.

Flex utilities

Pavilion comes with a set of handy flex-box classes to modify your layout. Note: these classes are also present in the utilities section.
